Code classification for Comorbidity

DxComorbid.Rd

The comorbidities classification (AHRQ, Charlson ,and Elixhauser Comorbidity) for ICD diagnostic codes is a diagnostic categorization scheme that can employ in many types of projects analyzing data on diagnoses.

IcdDxToComorbid(DxDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName,
  icd10usingDate, comorbidMethod, isDescription = FALSE)

Arguments

DxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID", "ICD", and "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of DxDataFile.
icdColName

A column for ICD of DxDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of DxDataFile
icd10usingDate

ICD-10 using date
comorbidMethod

Three comorbidity method: AHRQ, Charlson and Elixhauser Comorbidity. Change it to any of the other possible variables (ahrq,charlson, and elix).
isDescription

Category or description of standard classification methods for ICD diagnostic codes. By default it is set to FALSE ( Comorbidity categories).

Source

AHRQ

ICD-9-CM Elixhauser (2012-2015)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidity/comorbidity.jsp#references

ICD-10-CM Elixhauser (2019)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidityicd10/comorbidity_icd10.jsp

Charlson

ICD-9-CM Charlson (2006)

http://mchp-appserv.cpe.umanitoba.ca/Upload/SAS/ICD9_E_Charlson.sas.txt

ICD-10-CM Charlson (2006)

http://mchp-appserv.cpe.umanitoba.ca/Upload/SAS/ICD10_Charlson.sas.txt

Elixhauser

ICD-9-CM Elixhauser (2012-2015)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidity/comorbidity.jsp#references

ICD-10-CM Elixhauser (2019)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidityicd10/comorbidity_icd10.jsp

Details

Collapse ICD codes into a smaller number of clinically meaningful categories that are more useful for presenting descriptive statistics than are individual ICD diagnostic codes.

Examples

# sample file for example

head(sampleDxFile)
#>     ID  ICD       Date
#> 1:  A2 Z992 2020-05-22
#> 2:  A5 Z992 2020-01-24
#> 3:  A8 Z992 2015-10-27
#> 4: A13 Z992 2020-04-26
#> 5: A13 Z992 2025-02-02
#> 6: A15 Z992 2023-05-12

# Group diagnostic codes into charlson comorbidity categories

IcdDxToComorbid(sampleDxFile, ID, ICD, Date, "2015-10-01", charlson)
#> Wrong ICD format: total 9 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("A0.11 (20)", "E114 (8)", "Z9.90 (6)", "F42 (6)", "001 (5)", "75.52 (4)", "755.2 (3)", "123.45 (3)", "7552 (2)")
#> 	
#> Wrong ICD version: total 7 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("V27.0 (18)", "A01.05 (8)", "42761 (7)", "V24.1 (6)", "A0105 (5)", "E03.0 (4)", "650 (4)")
#> 	
#> Warning: The ICD mentioned above matches to "NA" due to the format or other issues.
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD format" means the ICD has wrong format
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD version" means the ICD classify to wrong ICD version (cause the "icd10usingDate" or other issues)
#> $groupedDT
#>       Short  ID    ICD       Date Comorbidity
#>   1:   Z992  A2   Z992 2020-05-22          RD

#>  ---
